comments:
Mylar restored a task editor on start up that came up empty and a message about missing task data was displayed in the title. The submit icon in the upper right was enabled though. Pressing it caused the error below.

-- Error Log --
Date: Wed May 30 11:03:37 EDT 2007
Message: no message
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylar
Stack Trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.editors.AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor$32.run(AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor.java:2710)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
We've removed submit action from the header all together now as it was too easy to hit by accident with negative effect.
